about.p: Web developer in training, passionate about creating digital solutions with purpose and creativity. I study ADS and am specializing in technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, Bootstrap, Sass, React, Next.js, Node.js, MongoDB, and Sequelize. I dream of living abroad and am building my path with practical projects, constant learning, and a lot of dedication.
